return.description:
The function returns a character set object with the following properties:
   
    
     charset
     Character set namecollation
     Collation namedir
     Directory the charset description was fetched from (?) or "" for built-in character setsmin_length
     Minimum character length in bytesmax_length
     Maximum character length in bytesnumber
     Internal character set numberstate
     Character set status (?)
